title: Teachers' Day: Saying 'Thank You' to educators
text:
chinadaily.com.cn | Updated: 2019-09-09 11:12

Editor's note: As Teachers' Day approaches, China Daily readers express their gratitude for their beloved teachers. Feel free to leave your comments.

numero_uno (UK)

Teaching is a noble profession and Confucius was one of China's greatest teachers. We should honor these great intellectuals for their contributions to society and to mankind in general. They painstakingly educate students year after year, in cities, towns or villages. I personally congratulate my teachers for their commendable hard work and dedication.
